overview_of_class:
This course will give you an overview of the German economy, its underlying structures, its current trends, and some of the problems the German economy faces. Throughout the course, you gain tools that will enable you to become well-versed in German economic topics. While the course is designed to introduce you to a variety of issues you will also be able to delve deeper into one topic of your choice by doing research and developing a website based on the topic.

Although content-driven, the course will also further develop your language skills. You will expand your vocabulary and become familiar with advanced grammar structures used heavily in the business context. Vocabulary and grammar will be incorporated into writing assignments and into language practice in class. This course is designed in a sequence with German 309-2 in the winter quarter and both courses together prepare the students for an internationally recognized Business German exam.

Readings and homework will be assigned throughout the quarter and as a final project, each student will pick a topic for a short research paper and interactive presentation.
name: Advanced Business German: the German Economy
subject: GERMAN
